description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**Course Requirements:**

**Attendance, Participation, Group Work, Assignments 50%**

**\*** Attendance: You will have 2 points deducted for each unexcused absence from your final grade.

**Book Talk 40%**

 **\*** Round 1 and 2:

\- Write a letter to the main character of the book.

\- Make an ID card which belongs to one of the characters: Be sure to make the card look like the cards for that particular state. Include a picture and all information found on and ID card. Don’t forget the signature. Remember to research what ID cards /Driver’s Licenses look like; as well as think about the character—especially the signature. You may ask each of the other students to sign the character’s name to find the one that would most likely belong to the character.

\- Make a map showing where the story took place.

\- Write a song for your story. (extra marks if presented in class)

\- Write a poem (or poems) about your story.

\- Make a comic strip of your story.

 **\*** Round 1: Present your book to the group.

 **\*** Round 2: World Café Presentation

**\*** Round 3: Do the book talk (PowerPoint Presentation, 2 to 3 minutes) to the class, have someone record your presentation, and upload the video footage to moodle.

**Oral Exam 5%**

**Lexile Reading Project Post-Test 5%**

**Bonus: Self-Study Project/ Learning Portfolio (5 bonus points at most)**

**\*** This is to encourage students to use English outside the classroom. You are encouraged to devote at least 10 hours on this project. Participate in the following events, or attend a talk, an event, a show, a competition etc. in which English is the main language. Submit a list/ summary of what you do at the end of the semester. This list should include information such as date, duration, details and any other crucial information.

**Two Exams:**

1.  NTNU \[English Proficiency Exam (optional, not required)\] Date & Time: Mar. 17th (Sun.) 8:30~17:30

2\. 大一新生藍思測驗後測Lexile Post-Test Date & Time: From May. 3rd to May. 31th (Mon. & Fri.)
